vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.12;
son of: Eshton (H0850);
brother of: Beth-rapha (H1051) and Paseah (H6454);
father of: Ir-nahash (H5904)
§ Tehinnah = "supplication"
a Judaite, son of Eshton and father of Ir-Nahash
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1a)   favor; (1b)   súplica; (2)   hijo de Estón; fundador de Ir-nahas; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
提欣拿 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "懇求"
猶大人伊施屯之子, 珥拿轄人之祖 #代上 4:12|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
提欣拿 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "恳求"
犹大人伊施屯之子, 珥拿辖人之祖 #代上 4:12|
